title: Din no Monshou (WN) - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Seinen
tags: Academy   Age Progression   Corruption   Demons   Determined Protagonist   Discrimination   Elves   Evil Gods   Genius Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Loli   Magic   Maids   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Nobles   Reincarnated in Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Akamaki Tart
description: The hero is a Ronin who is undertaking an embarrassing job search when he is killed in an unfortunate accident. When he wakes up, he has been re-incarnated into a new world. “I’ll never live a lazy life again.” He tries to restart his new life with such determination. He is born to a fallen noble. How on earth will he manage? This is the story of a young man and his partner’s struggles to save his home from downfall.>
